## agenc mission reload

Stop a running mission and immediately resume it

### Synopsis

Stop a running mission and immediately resume it with claude --continue.

This is equivalent to running 'mission stop' followed by 'mission resume' on
the same mission. Requires a mission ID (short or full UUID).

```
agenc mission reload <mission-id> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for reload
```

### SEE ALSO

* [agenc mission](agenc_mission.md)	 - Manage agent missions
